subNodes.conversationText: root
Yes <FirstName>, is there something you need?
I would like to know more about yourself.
What would you like to know?
How about your home village?
My brother and I left our people almost a year ago.  We could no longer follow their ways.
Continue
They speak of some Great Bear, Elos, who brought them to this world.  They say that occured a number of years before I was born.
I also have been told of this Elos, but I have never seen Him.
That's just the thing.  No one can prove to me that He even exists.  Anyway, my brother and I were tired of it all.
Continue
So we left and ventured into the forest.  There are so many unexplored parts of this world.  My brother and I love to discover new areas.
Continue
Is there anything else you would like to know?
Yes.
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Tell me about your brother's abduction.
We discovered some large vertical cliffs and were spending the day climbing different routes.
Continue
We decided to set up camp at the base of the cliffs, since it was getting late.
Continue
I went to gather wood from the nearby forest, when I heard my brother's call for help.
Continue
It was too late.  By the time I arrived back at camp, he was gone.
We're you able to track them?
No, that was when I decided to focus on learning how to track in the woods.
You've learned quickly.
It has been three months since my brother disappeared.  I've been focused ever since.
Continue
Is there anything else you would like to know?
Yes.
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
What do you know about Zorn?
I know that he is the eldest son of the Great Valdur.  I guess he wanted to rule Charn after his fathers' death.
Our system of judges has worked so far and we didn't want a king.
Since then, I hear, he has been gaining recruits.  Mostly from the dwarves and humans.  I'm not sure why they have been abducting so many people, but I guess it would be for slaves.
I wonder what he is up to.
I'm not sure, but if he is gathering slaves, then maybe my brother is still alive.
I agree.
Is there anything else you would like to know?
Yes.
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Nothing right now.
Nothing for now.
